definition: Yang Lan (1968-), Chinese media proprietor, journalist, and talk show hostess

sentences.english: TV host Yang Lan is one of China's biggest celebs.
sentences.chinese: 電視主持人楊瀾是中國的名人之一。

sentences.english: Ms. Yang, one of China's best-known celebrities, commands a sizable following in this demographic.
sentences.chinese: 作爲中國最知名的人物之一，楊瀾擁有一大批追隨者。

sentences.english: She was also an ambassador for the 2008 Olympic games in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 楊瀾是北京2008奧運會的形象大使。

sentences.english: In today's program, celebrity, Yang Lan talks about rainforest protection with Kathy Yin.
sentences.chinese: 在本期節目中，楊瀾與尹暢面對面，傾談雨林保護。

sentences.english: Media guru Yang Lan raises money for Specia.
sentences.chinese: 傳媒大腕楊瀾爲特奧會籌資。

sentences.english: Finally comprehensive summing-up and summary are do once to the managing style of Yang Lan .
sentences.chinese: 最後對楊瀾的掌管作風做一下週全的總結和歸納綜合。

sentences.english: TV host Yang Lan is one of China's biggest celebs.
sentences.chinese: 電視主持人楊瀾是中國最大的名人之一。

sentences.english: Celebrities are more likely to become the targets of the word-of-mouth maelstrom online.
sentences.chinese: 名人是最有可能成爲網上輿論的目標，例如楊瀾。
